title: Models, Markets, and Monetary Policy
content: Figure 4.  Market-Implied Probability Distribution of the Federal Funds Rate for Year-End 2019  Percentage Range  Note: Estimated from federal funds futures options (not adjusted for risk premiums).  Probabilities are zero for values above 2.75 percent. Source: CME Group; Federal Reserve staff estimates.
